events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit me at all, and I would like to request a refund or exchange.
The customer's request for money back due to sizing issues has been categorized under the refund cluster for appropriate handling.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. who handles refund and return requests for apparel items.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I'm here to help with your jacket refund or exchange request.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason you would like a refund instead of an exchange, if applicable?
My order number is 458392. I prefer a refund because the sizing chart was unclear, and I don't want to risk ordering a different size.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund process immediately and provide a prepaid return label for the jacket.
That sounds great, thank you for the swift response. I appreciate the prepaid label as it makes the return process easier.
The refund has been processed and a return label emailed to your account. Please ship the jacket back within 7 days.
Following up to make sure you have returned the jacket and to confirm the refund was received without any issues.
The case is now closed after successful refund confirmation. Thank you for your patience and please contact us for any future needs.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to your email. Your feedback helps us improve our services.
